directions: n a bowl, mix together the grated potatoes, garlic, bacon, red onion, spring onions, parsley, salt and pepper.

On a medium heat, place duck fat or oil in a pan and then spread all of the mixture evenly into the pan. When the rosti is browned on one side, flip it over with a large plate and cook the other side until golden brown.
ingredients: 3 cooked potatoes with skin on, grated
2-3 tbsp duck fat, or olive oil
title: Potato Rosti with the Lot
